author: Nicholas Panella

review: Great product.  So much better than the Sony DVD player we had been using to access amazon video content.  It's easier to navigate and about 5x faster to load programs (almost instantly).  Been using it about a month now, and only once did it seem to get locked up.  All I had to do was go to settings and restart it, which took less than a minute.  Haven't had any issues with needing to unplug it or anything I saw on other people's reviews.  Also, I hadn't seen this anywhere else, but I was able to connect this to my receiver, which then feeds video to the TV and sound to my stereo speakers.  It doesn't have to connect directly to the TV.
